welcomeDescription: Compete in tournaments, challenge friends in intense pong battles, and rise to the top of the leaderboard.
logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
aboutDescription: The main purpose of this website is to play Pong versus other players. Users can participate in a live match directly on the website, with two players using the same keyboard. A tournament system allows multiple players to take turns competing. Each participant must register with an alias at the beginning of a tournament, and a matchmaking system organizes the matches. The game stays true to the visual spirit of the original Pong (1972). This project, ft_transcendence, is part of the curriculum at Hive Helsinki (42 School).
sorryNotFound: The resource requested could not be found on this server!
howToPlayText: Use the arrow keys or ZQSD to move your paddle. Score points to win!
signUpSuccess: Sign up successful, you can now log in.
notLoggedInProfile: Please log in to view your profile.
notLoggedInUpdate: Please log in to update your profile.
